A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie managed in a few scenes to accomplish what Phantom Menace\, Attack of the Clones\, and Revenge 9f the Sith could not: give the antagonist a plausible motivation for turning to the Dark Side. I was iffy about Adam Driver after Force Awakens\, but now I'm all in. My only complaint was a bit too much comic relief.
